note: A Peter Thiel talk in 1999 speaking on cell phone adoption, internet access and the digitization of money. Some things look to be mired in 1990s libertarianism and it looks like he missed the possibility of a kind of 'open source' currency that could develop, but the sentiment is very similar to a kind of idealistic  cryptocurrency sentiment that exists today. Also linked is the Bitcoin2022 conference where Thiel talks (and where I first saw the original clip for the independent)
